See http://epa.gov/smartgrowth/smartlocationdatabase.htm for more details.</idPurp> <idCredit>Alexander Bell and Kevin Ramsey</idCredit> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit/> </Consts> </resConst> <idCitation> <resTitle>Access to Jobs/Workers via Transit</resTitle> </idCitation> </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> </metadata>
